name: ConfigEZ
0:
”Alexa, turn on bulb socket”
”Alexa, turn off bulb socket”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Config EZ is a smart home skill that allow user to control multiple smart devices individually with Alexa. Devices such as Smart AC Outlet , Smart Bulb & Smart Bulb Socket. The Config EZ will discover the smart devices you have installed in your house. You can then say "Alexa, turn on my living room lights" or "Alexa, turn off my AC Plug" and your AI virtual assistant obeys. 

Smart Bulb
· Alexa, turn on the Bedroom light
· Alexa, turn off the Bedroom light

Smart Bulb Socket
· Alexa, turn on the Room light
· Alexa, turn off the Room light

Smart AC Outlets
· Alexa, turn on the Living Room fan
· Alexa, turn off the Living Room fan

To get started, 
Step 1. Download & install "Config EZ" from Apple Store or Google Play Store.
Step 2. Sign up a new account. 
Step 3. Setup a new Config EZ device within the App.
Step 4. Make sure the device is controllable . 
Step 5. Go to Alexa App. for Skill setup. 

Alexa App
Step 1. Open Skill Page
Step 2. Search "Config EZ"
Step 3. Click on "Config EZ"
Step 4. Click Enable
Step 5. Login with Config EZ account. 
Step 6. Click Discover Devices or say "Alexa, discover device"
Step 7. Check if your bind device on the list. 
Step 8. Enjoy
